author: USA TODAY, Charles Trepany, USA TODAY
title: CNN's Chris Cuomo confirms his wife also has coronavirus: 'It just breaks my heart'
description: Chris Cuomo, who has been battling coronavirus for several days, gave an update to his brother New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo: His wife has it too.
content:
CNN anchor Chris Cuomo, brother of New York Governor Andrew Cuomo, tested positive for the coronavirus.
Associated Press
Chris Cuomo is giving another update on his battle with the coronavirus.
